website_summaries.verdict: Fun cafe setting to role play with Minnie Mouse. 27-piece set with a very low price tag.
pros: Nice detail in a set designed for children ages 2-5
Minnie Mouse figurine fits inside the delivery plane to provide supplies for her cafe
Plenty of fun accessories, including a teapot and a camera
Excellent price point for a Minnie Mouse toy
DUPLO set works well for helping preschoolers learn how to build
cons: Little appeal for children of school age

customer_reviews.title: For Minnie Mouse Fans
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter (21/2) loved this set. She is a big fan of Minnie Mouse. She especially liked the plane Minnie rides in with her camera, but GD wondered why it didn't actually take pictures. This is a good set for the small fry just learning how to build.
customer_reviews.author: Juniquilt2day

customer_reviews.title: A small set of legos easy to take with you!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 yr old grand daughter and she loves them! I don't know why, but I thought there would be more pieces to this set. However, it is very nice and if your child loves DIsneyland or Disney World, theywill LOVE these Legos.
customer_reviews.author: Deb's

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Set for Minnie Lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable set. Some of the pieces are small for a child under two so it makes sense that the minimum age is two for this product. My almost four year old granddaughter is delighted with it. I wish it came with more Disney characters, but it does give Grandma something to search for for the next birthday or special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: most of the pieces are prob a little too small ...
customer_reviews.text: most of the pieces are prob a little too small for my almost-5yr-old's hands she definitely needed help with the steps but once done - really enjoys playing with it very well made
customer_reviews.author: Abul Rahman

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my niece for Christmas and she loved it! It comes with 27 pieces and is a great set for a 2 year old. Her 4 year old sister loved it as well. Fun pieces and bright colors. You really can't go wrong with Legos!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toddler Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: This Minnie duplo set was purchased for a birthday gift for a soon-to-be 2 year old grandchild based on previous positive reviews. The packaging was nice and price reasonable for the size. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legos and Duplos are always great. I got this for my niece for her ...
customer_reviews.text: Legos and Duplos are always great. I got this for my niece for her second birthday and she loved it. The only problem is that it didn't have Daisey too, so she kept asking where's Daisey.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves These! Of course they are now part of the huge Lego collection we already have. The plane is her favorite.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set for a 2 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 2 year old (28 months) for Christmas and she has had a blast playing with them. They are large enough for her small hands to play with easily. Daddy is a pilot so the airplane was a hit too.

customer_reviews.title: Cute set with unique pieces
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this set for the unique pieces like the camera and the airplane, as well as the Minnie Mouse figure -- although she prefers the Minnie that came with the Mickey and Minnie birthday train set, since she has a removable skirt. We do wish the airplane had wheels; the bottom is flat, and even my not-quite-three-year-old expected an airplane to have landing gear. It's a cute set.

customer_reviews.title: For a minnie mouse lover
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away! Me and my daughter had fun putting this together. My daughter is 22 months old and the parts are just the right size for her. If you have a kiddo who is still apt to put things in their mouth, hold off. She loves the plane and putting Minnie everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift, As Expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my niece for her third birthday. She is obsessed with Minnie, anything Disney really, so this was a great choice. The pieces are large so I don't have to worry about her trying to eat them (even though she is mostly over the everything-in-mouth phase), and the set is sturdy and well packaged. Couldn't ask for a better gift! She loved it!

product_meta.title: LEGO DUPLO l Disney Mickey Mouse Clubhouse Minnie's CAF‚ 10830 Large Building Block Preschool Toy
product_meta.description:
Little Disney fans will love playing in Minnie Mouse's pretty cafe! It's easy to build with the LEGO DUPLO bricks designed especially for budding builders. There's a table and a chair with a teapot for role play, plus a pink delivery plane with turning propeller for some flying fun. Special bricks decorated as a cake, cupcakes and a gift will help young children start their own stories. This colorful preschool toy includes a DUPLO figure: Minnie Mouse.

BRAND STORY
By DUPLO
feature_bullets: Features a cafe with an opening window, table and chair, plus a delivery plane with turning propeller
Sit down at the table to decide which cake you would like to try in Minnie Mouse's cafe
Accessory elements include a teapot and a camera with a look-through viewfinder
Cafe facade measures over 5" (15cm) high, 5" (15cm) wide and 1" (5cm) deep
LEGO DUPLO products are specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands
This preschool toy offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 2-5

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars193 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
